For starters:Save 20% of it in a savings account Allocate 20% for a down payment for a house 30% for overall living expenses (comfortably of course) final 30% for investments I once managed to win $5000 in a lucky draw and used the money in the following way:Saved 20% for a rainny day Spent 50% for living expenses (over a span of 2 months)Spent 10% for lifestyle expenses final 20% placed in an "locked" savings account I would say what's most important is that you allocate certain % of the money in a bank account that prevents you from withdrawal.
